Shoot Them - Extra


A DLC, including Art book content.


Include:

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.All characters are over the age of 18

name: Shoot Them 2 - Extra

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home Premium or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Shoot Them - Extra A DLC, including Art book content.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
